***Python ml_test for APS method on 21-May-2021 16:07:07         ***

*********************************************************
*** Experiemnt setup  ***
*** S(x,v) = 1/sqrt(2*pi)*v^2*e^{-v^2/2}*(1+cos(2*pi*(x+1/2))) ***
*** r(x) = ax+b, with a=[0.], b=[1000.] and eps = 1.0  ***
*** Quantity of interest is F(X) = X  ***
*** No boundary conditions  ***
*********************************************************
